title: Sans ID please (Playstation 3 menu font)
content:
The type looks _very_ familiar, but I cannot seem to remember what it is. Any ideas ?

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023001553im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ps3-menu-font_4772.jpg)
author: apankrat

comments.content: No idea. But those "e" look awful. :S
Heh, yeah, they sure stick out.

Bump. Any pointers or guesses ?

I have spent an entire day yesterday on this, first on identifont, then just going type by type on myfonts and I cannot seem to find what this one is. This is starting to drive me a bit mad. Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thank you very much, Akira ! I just sent them an email asking of they sell to the outside of Japan .. and if their prices were real .. lol, just kidding.

I can get reasonably close to Rodin with [Akzidenz-Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023001553/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-bq/) though...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023001553im_/http:/typophile.com/files/akzidenz_5981.png)
